static load ( $  path ) [static]

load Attempts to load the requested file path, using the basename of the file as the language identifier (ie, "en.yml" for English or "fr.yml" for French) This method first checks in application/languages, then in system/languages if the path is relative. If a full path is provided, the resource is loaded from that location.

Parameters:
string$path,|$language(all paths must be {i18n abbrev}.yml)
Exceptions:
InvalidArgumentException
InvalidFileSystemPathException
Returns:
mixed $language_dictionary
Author:
Matt Brewer
static lookup ( $  path,
$  default = "",
$  lang = null 
) [static]

lookup Performs a lookup operation with the given keypath from the current (or provided) language. If the value is not set, the $default parameter is returned.

Parameters:
(Keypath|string)$keypath
(string|String)$default_text (optional - used if value is not defined)
(string|String)$lang (optional - uses default_language already defined)
Exceptions:
UnexpectedValueException
InvalidKeyPathException
Returns:
mixed $value
Author:
Matt Brewer
retrieve ( $  path,
$  default = "" 
)

retrieve Performs a lookup of the keypath with the current language, returning the $default if not set NOTE: Currently the only non-static method in the class, requires an instance to use this method

Parameters:
(Keypath|string)$keypath
string$default_text(optional - used if value is not defined)
